DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effectiveness www.OurRelationship.com , provide self-help , web-based program improve romantic relationship relate outcomes . Couples randomly assign complete OurRelationship program , PREP Online program , wait-list control group follow six month .
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Programs Improve Strengthen Romantic Relationships
DOC.detailed_description: Nationwide , lower-income ( LI ) couple ( household incomes < 200 % federal poverty level ) - many also African American , Hispanic/Latino , rural couple - face numerous challenge relationship . Chief amongst challenge : 1 ) high risk relationship problem 2 ) lack access effective relationship service prevent intervene relationship distress . Compared higher-income couple , LI marry cohabit couple significantly likely divorce separate report low relationship quality . Unfortunately , LI couple least likely receive intervention prevent solve relationship problem . To overcome barrier , propose test effectiveness two effective web-based curriculum - OurRelationship PREP Online . A total 850 LI couple recruit nationwide randomly assign PREP Online program , OurRelationship program , wait-list control group follow six month . Once randomly assign group , couple assess one month , two month , four month , six month follow randomization . After couple randomize wait-list control group finish wait period , able select program would like complete ( OurRelationship ePREP ) complete research assessment follow participation program . Interested couple find information ( sign study ) www.OurRelationship.com
DOC.criteria: 1 . They marry , engage , cohabit partner least six month 2 . They locate United States 3 . Both partner willing participate study 4 . Both partner age 18 64 ( inclusive ) 5 . Both partner fluent reader English language ( program material currently available English ) . 6 . Couples report household income 200 % Federal Poverty Level . 1 . Severe domestic violence 2 . Inadequate internet connection 3 . Previous participation OR , PREPO , inperson PREP , variants 4 . Current participation relationship program 5 . Current participation evaluation fund Administration Children Families
